title: WWE Wrestlepalooza on ESPN: Cena-Lesnar to kick off the show

title: Poll: Sellers edges Nussmeier as NFL draft's QB1

title: Sources: Bucs' Egbuka expected to play vs. Jets
content: Buccaneers rookie WR Emeka Egbuka, who is listed as questionable with hip and groin issues, is expected to play Sunday against the Jets, sources told ESPN's Jeremy Fowler.

title: Dream's Hillmon named WNBA's 6th Player of Year
content: Atlanta veteran forward Naz Hillmon, who averaged 8.6 points and 6.2 rebounds for the Dream and made 53 3-pointers this season, was named the WNBA's Sixth Player of the Year on Saturday, making her the first player in franchise history to win the award.

title: Bears Pro Bowl CB Johnson (groin) placed on IR
content: Bears Pro Bowl CB Jaylon Johnson was placed on injured reserve Saturday and will be sidelined for a minimum of four games.

title: Chiefs WR Worthy (shoulder) ruled out vs. Giants
content: Chiefs WR Xavier Worthy been ruled out for Sunday night's game against the Giants and is not traveling with the team.

title: Broncos place LB Greenlaw on IR with thigh injury
content: Denver Broncos linebacker Dre Greenlaw has been placed on injured reserve due to a thigh injury that has kept him out of both games this season.

title: Hakeem Olajuwon's son, Aziz, picks Stanford
content: Aziz Olajuwon, a top-40 recruit and the son of NBA Hall of Famer Hakeem Olajuwon, has committed to Stanford, he told ESPN on Saturday.

title: Hall joins Joyner-Kersee as U.S. heptathlon champ

content: Max Verstappen denied Carlos Sainz and Williams a shock pole position in one of the great Formula 1 qualifying sessions, featuring six red flags.

content: These fantasy hockey players underwhelmed last season, but could return to better production this year.

title: What New York City's Mayoral Candidate Zohran Mamdani Stands For
content: President Donald Trump calls him a "communist." His critics say he wants to defund the police. Zohran Mamdani insists he's just a guy trying to make New York City more affordable.

title: Manipur MP Files Police Complaint Against X User Over "Ambush" Post
content: BJP Rajya Sabha MP Maharaja Sanajaoba Leishemba has filed a police complaint against an X user over what he called a malicious post targeting him following the ambush on an Assam Rifles convoy in Manipur on Friday.

title: Revised H-1B Fee Only For New Applicants, Won't Affect Renewals Either: Sources
content: In a big relief for Indians who are currently on H-1B visas, the new $100,000 fee will apply only to the next upcoming lottery cycle and not existing holders or renewals, a White House official told NDTV.

title: 'Return To US Within 24 Hours, Don't Leave': Meta, Microsoft To H-1B Visa Holders
content: Major companies such as Meta and Microsoft went into a huddle on Saturday morning and urged all their H-1B visa holders to not leave the US for at least 14 days.

title: "Likely To Have Humanitarian Consequences": India On Trump Hiking H-1B Visa Fee
content: In a statement, the Ministry of External Affairs said that the H-1B visa fee hike could have a humanitarian consequences by way of disruption caused for families.

title: Pakistani Leader Alleges Authorities 'Disappearing' People In Balochistan
content: In a big statement, Pakistani politician Maulana Fazl-Ur-Rehman said that people are being disappeared and kidnapped by the country's authorities in Balochistan.

title: Intertwined In Death: Mother, Sons' Bodies Found Under Chamoli Landslide Debris
content: As rescue operations in Uttarakhand's disaster-hit Chamoli district continued, a heart-rending visual emerged from the debris when a woman was found with her twin sons clinging to her body - all three dead.

title: 'Tilak', Raksha Sutra', 'Gau Mutra': VHP's Criteria For Garba Entry Spark Row
content: Seeking to ensure that only Hindus get entry to garba events, the Vishwa Hindu Parishad (VHP) has said people will have to apply a 'tilak' (a mark on the forehead), tie a sacred thread ('raksha sutra') and offer prayers to a Hindu god.

title: After CEO Relocation Post, Siddaramaiah Sets 1-Month Deadline To Fix Potholes
content: Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah has expressed strong displeasure over the poor state of Bengaluru's roads and traffic management, giving officials a month's time to fix it.

title: 4 Arrested For Raping Girl in Jharkhand's Godda: Cops
content: Four persons were arrested in Jharkhand's Godda district for allegedly raping a teenage girl in Boarijore area, police said on Saturday.

title: Wreath-Laying Ceremony Held For Two Soldiers Killed In Manipur Ambush
content: A wreath-laying ceremony was held in Manipur's Imphal to honour the two Assam Rifles soldiers who died in the Friday's ambush in Bishnupur district.

title: Students Allege Financial Mismanagement, Intensify Protest Against Vice Chancellor
content: Students gheraoed the office of West Bengal National University of Juridical Sciences Vice-Chancellor (V-C) Nirmal Kanti Chakrabarti, protesting against the "glaring lack of financial transparency" and "administrative failure".

title: Elderly British Couple Back In UK After Taliban Release
content: An elderly British couple released by the Taliban authorities after almost eight months in detention in Afghanistan arrived back in the UK.

title: Man Paraded With Garland Of Shoes For Alleged Unnatural Act With Cow: Cops
content: A man was forced to wear a garland of shoes and was paraded in public view in a village in Madhya Pradesh's Agar Malwa district on Saturday, allegedly by members of a local Hindutva outfit who accused him of committing an unnatural act with a cow.

title: Old Food, Death Threats: Truck Cleaner 'Kidnapped' By Puja Khedkar's Family
content: The truck cleaner, who was abducted by former IAS probationer Puja Khedkar's family after a road rage accident in Navi Mumbai last week, said he was kept locked in a room, fed stale food and given death threats.

title: Karnataka Government Sets Up SIT To Probe Mass Voter Deletions In Aland Constituency
content: The Karnataka government on Saturday constituted a Special Investigation Team (SIT) to investigate allegations of large-scale deletion of voters from electoral rolls in Kalaburagi district's Aland constituency during the 2023 assembly polls.

title: Video: Gautam Adani, Wife Offer Prayers At Ahmedabad Temple
content: Gautam Adani and his wife offered prayers at a Jain temple in Ahmedabad, a day after SEBI gave a clean chit to the Adani Group.

title: "Woh Haath Jod Ke Baithe Hai": Smriti Irani, KTR's Banter At NDTV's Yuva
content: The NDTV Yuva Conclave on Saturday saw a witty exchange between BJP leader, former minister and actor Smriti Irani and Bharat Rashtra Samithi working president KT Rama Rao.

title: Clashes Erupt During Kurmi Agitation In Bengal's Purulia, Several Cops Injured
content: The agitation by the Kurmi community demanding Scheduled Tribe status turned violent at Kotshila railway station in West Bengal's Purulia on Saturday.

title: "I Don't Have FOMO, Congress Has ROMO": Smriti Irani At NDTV Yuva
content: BJP leader Smriti Irani used the stage at NDTV Yuva's Mumbai edition on Saturday to deliver remarks on politics, democracy, and her party's rivals, while also reflecting on her own political and acting journey.

content: What are fentanyl precursors? Why is it difficult to monitor the trade? How does the supply chain work?

title: Amoebic meningoencephalitis | Conflated cases

content: More than ‚Çπ370 crore have come from West Bengal, where he had worked for Mamata Banerjee's Trinamool Congress in the 2021 assembly polls. Besides, Kishor is getting huge funds from states like Telangana, Tamil Nadu and Karnataka, alleges BJP's state media in-charge Danish Iqbal

title: Postpone socio-educational survey or extend time given: H.D. Kumaraswamy
content: Union Minister H.D. Kumaraswamy has demanded that the socio-educational survey be postponed beyond Dasara or the time given for it be extended

title: Young stars shine bright in this camp for Sri Lankan Tamil refugees near city
content: An exposure visit by industry leaders to the camp, organised by SICCI and the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees, highlighted the success stories scripted by its young residents

title: Dasara festival at Srisailam temple to begin on September 22
content: ‚ÄòKainkaryams‚Äô will be performed to the deities as usual; sacred silk robes will be offered on behalf of the government on October 1

title: Kochi water distribution upgrade project awaits govt. sanction
content: The agreement between the KWA and private entity, SUEZ, was inked in June; company will begin work once the advance payment is given, says KWA official

title: PhD scholar found dead in IIT Kharagpur
content: After the researcher‚Äôs father could not reach him over the phone, he contacted the institute‚Äôs security. His room was found locked following which the institute alerted local police.

title: PDS reforms introduced to reduce diversion and smuggling of ration: A.P. Minister
content: Reforms aimed at ensuring the poor and farmers benefit directly, making PDS not just a welfare scheme but a symbol of dignity, justice, and trust, says Nadendla Manohar

title: Watch: Trump‚Äôs H-1B visa order | Explained
content: Employers will now need to pay $100,000 (around ‚Çπ83 lakh) annually for each H-1B employee, making renewals a costly decision. The move, officials say, is aimed at ensuring only highly skilled workers are hired while boosting U.S. revenue. For Indian professionals, who make up the majority of H-1B holders, the change raises uncertainty around jobs and green card hopes. A proposed 25% outsourcing tax could add further pressure on India‚Äôs $220 billion IT export industry.

title: DMK government achieved in 4 years what the AIADMK could not in a decade: Stalin
content: The Chief Minister says Gross State Domestic Product is a key indicator reflecting growth across sectors; he adds that despite the failure of the Centre to provide T.N. its due share of funds, his govt. achieved an economic growth rate of 11.19%, which is double than that of the previous AIADMK regime

title: Allahabad HC refuses to quash FIR against singer Neha Singh Rathore over her social media posts
content: The High Court said Ms. Rathore‚Äôs posts were derogatory and disrespectful toward the Prime Minister Narendra Modi

title: Bengaluru techies, tech firms jittery as Trump announces massive H1-B visa fee hike
content: Industry leaders foresee a major shift in how companies, both in the U.S. and India, manage their talent

title: Manithaneya Makkal Katchi, Kongunadu Makkal Desia Katchi among 42 parties from Tamil Nadu de-listed by Election Commission
content: According to the Representation of People Act, 1951, if the party does not contest elections continuously for six years, it shall be removed from the list of registered parties

title: Political leaders spar over VHP advisory banning non-Hindus in Garba events
content: BJP Minister Chandrashekhar Bawankule says it is a ‚Äòright‚Äô while Congress leader Vijay Wadettiwar says the VHP wants to divide society over religion and reap political benefits out of it.

content: Tune in to Pulse Maharashtra with Vinaya Deshpande for an in-depth conversation from Nagpur, Maharashtra‚Äôs political heartland

title: MHA calls next round of talks on Ladakh on October 6
content: A high-powered committee will hold talks with Leh Apex Body and Kargil Democratic Alliance, which demand Statehood for Ladakh and its inclusion under the Sixth Schedule (for tribal areas status) of the Constitution.

title: Karnataka proposes law to fix minimum wage, work hours for domestic workers
content: The preliminary draft of the Domestic Workers (Social Security and Welfare) Bill makes an agreement between employer and employee mandatory

title: On last day of Bihar Adhikar Yatra, Tejashwi seeks people‚Äôs support to change government
content: Out of 10 districts the Leader of the Opposition in the Bihar Legislative Assembly visited during the Yatra, six were Yadav-dominated ‚Äî Jehanabad, Patna, Madhepura, Saharsa, Supaul and Vaishali

title: CJI Gavai faults judges‚Äô conduct, says they must exercise their immense power with humility and responsibility
content: Gavai says conduct of some judges causing discontent in the Bar; adds both judges and lawyers should work together and that ‚Äòno one is superior or inferior‚Äô

title: Some uncertainties likely due to U.S. decision on H-1B visas: HYSEA head
content: Over the last several years, IT services companies have been reducing their dependence on H-1B visa, says Prashanth Nandella, adding that there is bound to be pressure and necessitate reworking of business plans to an extent without impacting projects

title: Police rescue bus passengers stranded in overflowing water
content: Responding to a distress call, the Uyyalawada police undertake the rescue operation to save the passengers of a private bus

title: Reforms have transformed bureaucracy, says PM‚Äôs Principal Secretary P.K. Mishra
content: Moving beyond the limitations of annual assessment reports, the senior bureaucrat said the government had introduced a multi-source feedback system in 2016

title: Punjab‚Äôs kinnow growers anxious over water-logging following rains
content: The heavy rain this season has flooded orchards and raised the saline groundwater table in Fazilka and other districts, dealing a severe blow to the farmers

title: While good, ICMR impact scale may deter research in public interest
content: ICMR‚Äôs new IRIS scale promises a uniform way to weigh the impact of health research, but its reliance on publication-equivalents raises questions about fairness, priorities, and the ethos of science as a public good

title: We live at a time when fiction is treated as history to distort reality: Amarnath Ramakrishna
content: Mr. Ramakrishna contended that history could only be based on facts and not on literature; he said that those who attempt to fictionalise history use literature in defence, but excavations could never be fictionalised¬†or modified

title: EHP parasite causes mass shrimp deaths, stunted growth in Godavari region, say SIFT experts
content: Officials advise farmers to fully harvest shrimp and let ponds dry for several weeks to eliminate the infection before restocking

title: Migrant workers from West Bengal face discrimination in housing, harassment over language, study finds
content: About¬†62.87% respondents cited better employment as the main reason for migration, and 60.23% said migration had adversely impacted their education

title: Stree Sakthi Scheme likely to increase rush atop Indrakeeladri during Dasara festivities
content: About 20 lakh pilgrims are expected during the 12-day Dasara festivities, officials to monitor the situation round the clock, say police

title: PM Modi lays foundation for three projects for Chennai and Kamarajar Ports
content: Port‚Äôs existing revetment behind the coastal berth is to be strengthened at a cost of ‚Çπ33 crore, ensuring long-term stability of port infrastructure

title: Soldier¬†killed as anti-terror operation enters second day
content: The Army and J&K Police have been engaged with three to four terrorists hiding in a forest since September 19, 2025; so far, no slain terrorist has been cited in the area

title: Amid speculation of lower turnout, Ayyappa sangamam¬†draws to close
content: Devaswom Minister V. N. Vasavan says a total of 4,126 participants registered for the event, of whom 1,819 were from Kerala, 2,125 from 13 other States, and 182 were international representatives

title: India, Canada agree to work towards ‚Äònew chapter‚Äô in ties
content: National Security Advisor discusses with Canadian counterpart the way forward for a collaborative approach in bilateral relations

title: Rise above failure and chart a successful career path, MLC Alapati Rajendra Prasad exhorts students
content: At a seminar organised on ‚ÄòCareers in Management & Sciences‚Äô, experts say that knowledge in various domains will help land better opportunities

title: With their presence and absence, community organisations leave an impact on Global Ayyappa Sangamam
content: Nair Service Society and SNDP Yogam mark their presence, while there were no representatives from the Pandalam Palace and the Malayaraya Mahasabha

title: UDF panel collects proposals on health sector
content: The panel will compile the proposals it receives into a report to be submitted to the Health department by 2026

title: National honour for Mohanlal, cultural icon of Kerala
content: Known for his effortless style of acting and ability to portray the whole gamut of human emotions, Mohanlal has over a career spanning close to five decades, essayed some of the most memorable acting performances in Malayalam cinema

title: Mamata Banerjee starts Durga Puja inauguration; set to inaugurate 3,000 pandals across West Bengal in 5 days
content: In an address after inaugurating a pandal at Tala Prattoy, the Chief Minister calls for unity among people of different origins. She raises concern over declining respect for Bengali songs.

title: INCOIS cleans up Ponnani beach
content: Scientists, students, and local volunteers joined hands to clean up the shoreline and spread awareness about ocean pollution

title: NCP hints at fighting independently in the upcoming local body elections in Maharashtra
content: Except in the BMC, where the ruling Mahayuti alliance will fight together, local cadres will decide at other locations, senior NCP (Ajit Pawar) leader Praful Patel told The Hindu

title: Minister Bindu slams Suresh Gopi over ‚ÄòKalungu Samvadhangal‚Äô
content: Says ‚Äòfeudal-style durbars‚Äô mocking the poor are unacceptable. The Minister calls for BJP‚Äôs intervention

title: Easy availability of multivitamins may result in more harm than good, doctors warn
content: Rising health awareness, increasing disposable income, urbanisation, ageing demographics, and the growing adoption of preventive health solutions across outlets is causing India‚Äôs dietary supplements market to expand rapidly, with troubling consequences

title: Watch: Major tunnel completed for Mumbai‚ÄìAhmedabad bullet train
content: The first phase of the bullet train project will be first launched on the Surat-Bilimora section in 2027, covering Thane in 2028 and the Bandra Kurla Complex in 2029

title: State convention of KSRTEA to be held in Kozhikode
content: Around 500 selected delegates from Kerala State Road Transport Corporation units across the State will take part in the event

title: H-1B visa fee hike: A self-goal for US? How India stands to gain
content: Donald Trump's decision to impose a $100,000 fee on H-1B visas has sparked debate, with Indian leaders warning of potential benefits for India. Experts suggest this move could discourage applications, accelerate offshoring, and prompt skilled professionals to return to India. While facing backlash in the US, the long-term impact may fuel India's growth as a global innovation hub.

title: Former Delhi captain Mithun Manhas tipped to become new BCCI president
content: Mithun Manhas, the former Delhi captain, is the leading candidate for BCCI president after discussions in New Delhi. The nomination deadline is Sunday, with elections on September 28. Raghuram Bhat of KSCA is expected to secure a position in the apex council, while Arun Dhumal is likely to remain as IPL chairman. Final decisions are anticipated after further discussions.

title: $100k H1-B visa fee: Not annual, says Trump official; issues 3-point clarification
content: The White House clarified that the newly announced $100,000 H-1B visa fee applies only to new applications, not renewals or existing visa holders. This clarification addresses widespread confusion following a presidential proclamation that initially sparked fears of urgent deadlines and potential disruption to the tech talent pipeline.

title: Bihar polls announcement likely in first week of October
content: Bihar is bracing for state elections, likely in two phases starting early October, pitting CM Nitish Kumar's NDA against a determined opposition. Caste dynamics, intensified by the state's recent caste count revealing a significant OBC/EBC population, are expected to heavily influence the polls.

title: H-1B visa hike: JPMorgan asks staff to return to US before Sept 21
content: JPMorgan has advised H1-B visa holders abroad to return to the US before September 21. This follows President Trump's order of a $100,000 annual fee for each H-1B worker. Microsoft has issued a similar advisory. The new rule is expected to impact Indian IT firms like Infosys and TCS.

title: H-1B fee hike: Trump torpedos visa programme; throws million of Indians into turmoil
content: President Trump's executive order imposing a $100,000 fee for H1-B visas has sparked turmoil, impacting numerous Indian professionals. The move, intended to prioritize American jobs, faces legal challenges and criticism for potentially hindering innovation. Companies now weigh the cost of retaining foreign talent against hiring domestic workers, as immigration attorneys prepare to contest the new rules.

title: Zubeen Garg's mortal remains arrive in Delhi; fans break through barricades
content: The mortal remains of beloved Assamese singer Zubeen Garg, who passed away in Singapore, have arrived in India. Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma received the remains in Delhi, ensuring their transport to Guwahati. Garg's body will be kept at the Arjun Bhogeswar Baruah Sports Complex on September 21 for public homage.

title: H-1B visa hike: Applicants face $100K fee; These groups will be exempted from paying
content: President Trump's new executive order imposes a $100,000 fee on many H-1B visa applications, impacting companies hiring foreign workers. Exemptions exist for healthcare and engineering roles. The order grants the Homeland Security Secretary power to waive fees for vital national interest roles. Concerns persist that the H-1B program displaces American workers, prompting stricter requirements for highly skilled applicants.

title: 'No need to rush back': Big clarification on new H-1B rules - What US official said
content: A US Administration official clarified that the newly announced $100,000 annual fee on H-1B visas applies exclusively to new applicants, offering reassurance to current visa holders. This clarification follows President Trump's proclamation introducing significant changes to the H-1B visa program, raising concerns about its potential impact on America's tech talent pipeline.

title: Stephen Curry‚Äôs wife Ayesha gives ‚Äòdate night‚Äô vibes during romantic evening
content: Stephen Curry and Ayesha Curry, celebrated as couple goals, recently shared glimpses of their romantic date night, highlighting the importance of maintaining their connection. Reflecting on a pivotal moment early in their relationship, Stephen revealed Ayesha's impactful advice when he was deciding between entering the NBA and finishing college. Her encouragement to prioritize his degree significantly influenced his life.

title: H-1B visa fees hike to $100K: Microsoft warns employees; asks to return immediately
content: Microsoft urged its H-1B and H-4 visa employees to return to the US before the September 21 deadline due to a new $100,000 annual fee per H-1B worker. The company also advised those already in the US to remain there.

title: Will talk to Reds if killings stop: Chhattisgarh deputy CM
content: Chhattisgarh's Deputy CM Vijay Sharma expressed the government's willingness to consider peace negotiations with CPI(Maoist), contingent on an immediate halt to civilian killings and IED removal. Despite the offer, Maoist violence persisted, raising doubts about the sincerity of the proposal. The government awaits a final decision from top leadership while maintaining counter-Naxal operations.

title: Cardi B vs Joe Budden: Lyric doubts, pregnancy reveal clash ‚Äî fans react
content: Cardi B is facing criticism after Joe Budden questioned her songwriting abilities on her new album, "Am I the Drama?". She defended herself on social media, providing proof of her writing process. This comes amidst backlash surrounding her pregnancy announcement with Stefon Diggs, who is reportedly involved in another paternity dispute, adding fuel to the controversy.

title: NFL: Gracie Hunt shares heartfelt update with boyfriend amid Chiefs skid
content: Gracie Hunt, the Kansas City Chiefs' heiress, shared heartwarming photos on Instagram from a wedding she attended with her boyfriend, Derek Green. The couple, who have known each other since childhood through their families' connection to the Chiefs, looked deeply in love. Hunt expressed her views on love and faith in the post's caption, emphasizing its importance in daily life.

title: Lauren Kyle: NHL star Connor McDavid‚Äôs wife opens her cottage retreat
content: Lauren Kyle McDavid, wife of Edmonton Oilers captain Connor McDavid, is featured in ELLE Canada, showcasing her lakeside cottage. The interior designer, entrepreneur, and founder of Kyle & Co Design highlights a space that blends European elegance with modern simplicity, as her retreat reflects her love for entertaining. Along with thoughtful design details, she creates a warm, welcoming atmosphere.

title: Charlie Kirk‚Äôs assassination: Erika Kirk pulls Taylor Swift into controversy
content: Following Charlie Kirk's shocking assassination, his widow, Erika Kirk, has ignited controversy by involving Taylor Swift in memorial plans. Erika's ambition to outshine a Taylor Swift concert at Kirk's memorial event on September 21st has sparked outrage among Swift's fans.

title: For $1m to $5m, Trump rolls out gold & platinum pathway to US residency
content: President Trump unveiled the "Trump Gold Card," offering expedited US residency for a $1 million "gift" to the Department of Commerce, while simultaneously decimating the H1B visa program. Critics question the legality and viability of the card, which aims to generate substantial revenue and replace existing visa categories. The administration defends the program as an executive action benefiting American taxpayers.

title: Asia Cup: Bangladesh beat Sri Lanka; Shanaka's 64 not enough to win
content: Bangladesh clinched a narrow four-wicket victory against Sri Lanka in the Asia Cup Super Fours, fueled by impressive half-centuries from Saif Hassan and Towhid Hridoy. Sri Lanka posted 168/7, highlighted by Dasun Shanaka's explosive 64, but Bangladesh successfully chased it down, reaching 169/6 in 19.5 overs. Despite some late-order jitters, Bangladesh held their nerve to secure the win.

title: 'Humanitarian consequences': India reacts to US H-1B visa fee hike; maps way forward
content: The Indian government has voiced concerns over the US decision to increase H-1B visa fees to $100,000 annually, foreseeing potential disruptions for Indian professionals and their families. This move, effective September 21, 2025, is defended by US officials as a measure to curb program abuse and generate revenue, but it raises worries about its impact on talent mobility and the competitiveness of the US technology sector.

title: Asia Cup: Pakistan team brings in motivational speaker ahead of India clash
content: Following a significant defeat against India and a subsequent handshake controversy, Pakistan's cricket team has enlisted motivational speaker Dr. Raheel Karim. He will assist the team in managing pressure ahead of their crucial Super 4s stage rematch this Sunday. The Pakistan Cricket Board hopes Dr. Karim's experience will bolster the team's morale and performance.

title: Silence of the Lambs: Tech titans tongue-tied over Trump's H-1B move
content: Tech giants previously championed H-1B visas. Elon Musk even threatened action to defend it. However, a White House decision changed the landscape. MAGA activists, opposing H1B visas, found support in Stephen Miller. They lobbied for restrictions, targeting the OPT program. US Tech Workers forum celebrated this victory. They urged further action to protect American workers.

title: Congress vs ECI: Karnataka govt forms SIT; to probe 'vote deletion' on Aland seat
content: The Karnataka government has formed a Special Investigation Team. This SIT will investigate alleged vote deletions in the Aland assembly segment. The move follows Rahul Gandhi's accusations against the Chief Election Commissioner. Gandhi claimed the CEC protected those deleting votes. The Election Commission refuted Gandhi's claims. The EC stated no online deletion by the public is possible.

title: In numbers: H-1B was already tough for Indians; Trump's $100K fee just made it tougher
content: The H-1B programme was created in 1990 with a cap of 65,000 visas per year, later expanded to include 20,000 extra slots for US master‚Äôs degree holders. That total of 85,000 visas has not changed in over a decade, even as America‚Äôs economy and demand for skilled workers exploded.

title: Asia Cup: Drama in Dubai! Pak cancel press conference beofre India match
content: Pakistan have cancelled its pre-match press conference before their Asia Cup Super Four clash against India, marking the second consecutive time they've skipped media duties. This follows a dispute with match referee Andy Pycroft over a handshake controversy during their previous encounter. The PCB's request to remove Pycroft was rejected, leading to heightened tensions and potential ICC action against Pakistan.

title: 'Open & non-discriminatory': China on TikTok deal with US
content: China has affirmed its stance on the TikTok issue in the US, emphasizing respect for enterprise autonomy and welcoming market-based negotiations that comply with Chinese laws. They urge the US to provide a fair business environment for Chinese companies like TikTok. Despite Trump's touted "deal," experts note finalization is distant.

title: ‚ÄòGukesh is not even 20 yet‚Äô: Grand Swiss was an eye-opener in many ways
content: The FIDE Grand Swiss 2025 witnessed Anish Giri's triumph and Vaishali Rameshbabu's repeat victory, alongside Matthias Bluebaum's unexpected Candidates qualification. Despite Gukesh Dommaraju's stumble, the event highlighted India's mixed fortunes and the rise of young talents like America's Abhimanyu Mishra. Divya Deshmukh's fearless performance in the Open section also underscored the growing strength of women in chess, inspiring future participation.

title: H-1B fee hike: Trump‚Äôs $100,000 rule sparks outcry; attorneys prepare legal action
content: Donald Trump's new rule impacts H-1B visa holders. A $100,000 fee is needed for entry after September 21, 2025. This affects many Indians awaiting US jobs. Legal challenges are expected. The policy raises concerns about fairness. Experts predict uncertainty for businesses and professionals. The proclamation's legality is under scrutiny. It may face court injunctions soon.

title: Stephen A Smith vs Jimmy Kimmel: 'Where was the joke?' Trump grief outrage
content: Following Charlie Kirk's assassination and the subsequent cancellation of Jimmy Kimmel's show due to controversial remarks, ESPN's Stephen A. Smith criticized Kimmel's comments about President Trump's reaction to Kirk's death. Smith questioned the comedic intent behind Kimmel's remarks, sparking outrage among fans who defended Kimmel's statements as highlighting Trump's insincerity.

title: Why does SKY close his eyes during nat'l anthem? India captain explains
content: Suryakumar Yadav revealed he closes his eyes during the Indian national anthem to reflect on the immense pride and gratitude he feels representing his country. He cherishes every opportunity to wear the Indian jersey and thanks God for the chance to play. The India-Pakistan match held special significance, marking his first encounter against Pakistan as captain.

title: Barc making reactor for Navy‚Äôs next-gen N-subs
content: Bhabha Atomic Research Centre is developing a powerful 200 MWe reactor to significantly enhance the endurance of the Indian Navy's future submarines, including the S-5 class. This upgrade, more than doubling the power of existing reactors, is crucial for strengthening India's sea-based nuclear deterrent amidst China's growing naval capabilities.

title: NFL‚Äôs richest: Top 10 stars ranked; Mahomes leads, Kelce-Swift pays off
content: Patrick Mahomes tops the 2025 NFL earners with $80 million, combining his Chiefs salary and endorsements from brands and sports team investments. Quarterbacks dominate the top spots, including Josh Allen, Justin Herbert, Dak Prescott, and Tua Tagovailoa. Travis Kelce leads in endorsements, boosted by his podcast and celebrity connection, while Micah Parsons, T.J.

title: 'I repeat‚Ä¶‚Äô: Rahul‚Äôs ‚Äòweak PM‚Äô jibe at Modi after Trump‚Äôs H-1B fee hike; shares old post
content: Following the US decision to impose a hefty $100,000 fee on H-1B visa applications, Congress launched a coordinated attack on Prime Minister Narendra Modi. Rahul Gandhi criticized Modi as a "weak PM" for failing to protect Indian interests, while Mallikarjun Kharge referenced Trump's past claims and PM Modi's rally with him.

title: NLL releases full 2025-26 regular-season schedule
content: the national lacrosse league has revealed its entire 126-game, regular-season schedule for the 2025-26 season . the matchup pits the Toronto Rock against the newly relocated Oshawa FireWolves on Nov. 28 . this game will feature 2025 no. 1 overall pick CJ Kirst of the Rock taking on reigning NLL Rookie of the Year Dyson Williams .

title: The Playbook: Lineup locks, Shadow Reports for Week 3
content: Mike Clay explains why fantasy managers should bench WR Jerry Jeudy in the Browns' week 3 matchup against the Packers . this column features score projections, over/unders, win probabilities, and, of course, easily digestible fantasy advice .

title: NFL picks:  An over, a cover, a parlay and multiple player props we like for Sunday
content: Matt Bowen and Seth Walder pick out plus-expected value bets each week . a former NFL safety, Bowen predicts positive matchups and game winners from tape study and his understanding of the league . this week's picks will not be limited to a certain type of bet .

title: Power Rankings: Where every team ranks with less than two weeks left
content: three teams have clinched playoff spots for the second consecutive year . there are nine left to fill with 11 days remaining in the 2025 regular season . it's just a matter of time before additional clubs lock up berths, but others still have a lot to play for .

title: News: Wilyer Abreu nears return; Astros' Alvarez back on IL
content: fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . the slate features a doubleheader with the red-hot Cleveland Guardians visiting the Minnesota Twins for a separate admission twin bill .

title: Buccaneers' '76 throwbacks reign supreme in NFL Week 3 threads
content: the originals include a running Jaguar on the teal jersey sleeves and a triple-color stripe on white pants . the helmet has the original primary logo decal worn from 1995 to 2013, with the numbers complementing the look in white with a black and golf .

title: WNBA playoff schedule: Semifinals set with Mercury-Lynx, Fever-Aces
content: the WNBA semifinals are a best-of-five with a 2-2-1 setup . the higher seed will host games 1, 2, 5 and 7 . we'll update each series as games are played and each round as matchups are decided .

title: Don't be surprised if ... Chase remains No. 1, Dobbins runs for 1,000
content: fantasy football managers must decide what to believe and what not to believe moving forward . if any of these thoughts come true, don't be surprised . backup QB Jake Browning has been in this situation before . it was his first season with the Bengals in 2023 .

title: 2026 class rankings: Coaching carousel hitting top recruits
content: the coaching changes have reopened the recruitments for several players within the SC Next 300 player rankings . the impact on the rankings is likely far from done . a promising UCLA class lost several commits following the dismissal of DeShaun Foster .

title: Your guide to the WNBA semis: Predictions, MVP finalists and ... No. 6 seed Indiana
content: the Phoenix Mercury defeat the fifth-seeded Liberty 79-73 . they move on behind 23 points from Satou Sabally . the no. 4 seed beat the Liberty in games 2 and 3 to advance to the 2025 WNBA semifinals .

title: Let's preview Week 3 games: Picks, predictions, and nuggets to know
content: quarterback injuries have affected a few top QBs . quarterbacks are ruled out, and quarterbacks' Brock Purdy and the Commanders' Jayden Daniels are listed as questionable . the Chiefs look to dig themselves out of their first 0-2 start against the Giants .

title: PM's salute to young boy wins hearts, viral video captures priceless reaction - watch
content: the TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics .
